attributes.action: raise the personal tax free allowance by more than the rate of inflation annually.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current level at which income tax becomes payable at the basic rate is £5,035

If the personal 'tax-free' allowance was raised by more than the rate of inflation annually, it would benefit everyone equally but mean far more to the lowest paid. 

It could also encourage the unemployed to find work as more of their earnings would be exempt from taxation.

If also applied to the Pensioners allowance it would benefit those with income other than just the state pension, as they currently pay tax on any income over and above £7,280
